text: Kevin Robert Kiley Jr. (born April 28, 1981) is an American professional wrestler and commentator best known for his time with WWE from 2007 to 2016 under the ring name Alex Riley. He wrestled on the second season of NXT with The Miz as his pro. He has come under controversy for driving while drunk in 2010 which almost led to him losing his contract with WWE. == Championships and accomplishments == * Florida Championship Wrestling ** FCW Florida Heavyweight Championship (1 time) * Pro Wrestling Illustrated ** Ranked No. 106 of the top 500 wrestlers in the PWI 500 in 2011 == References == == Other websites == * * Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:American professional wrestlers Category:Former WWE wrestlers Category:Professional wrestling announcers Category:Sportspeople from Virginia Category:Sportspeople from Washington, D.C.
title: Alex Riley (wrestler)
